Address.Address1: carrer de la mare de deu del desamparats 23

Description.Text: Reception and check in will be at: Consell de Cent, 322, 1st floor, 1st door. Customers must call 30 minutes before arriving to arrange key collection at: 0034 677 738 635. Should you need to check-in after 10pm, the reception will be at the apartment directly. To know your arrival time in order to meet you at the apartment, please email to: reservations@thestreetsapartments.com. Once in Barcelona, you should call us 30 minutes before the arrival at phone number: +34 677 738 635. For arrivals outside the check in time mentioned above, you will be asked to pay an extra fee to the member of staff who meets you: a 30? fee after 10pm and a 50? fee after 1am

The apartments are located in the Gracia district. Set 500 m from Fontana Metro Station. You can find several restaurants, bars, and a grocery shop within a 5-minute wal. Passeig de Gracia, famous for its luxury shops, is 900 m from the property, and Plaza Catalunya is 3 metro stops away.
This accommodation has a very small lobby.

Message.Text:
Room 1
City tax: Barcelona hotels charge a nominal daily City Tourist Tax directly to the customer. Local regulations state this must be collected by the hotel and cannot be prepaid. Please don’t hesitate to contact our call-centre if you require further information.

Important Information: Please note : - Check-in place for apartments before 3pm is at Carrer escudellers 18 for all buildings and luggage storage. - Deposit of 50€ per day and per apartment (maximum 200€) - Reception schedule from 11am to 7pm - Extra charge for late check in from 19h to 1h is 30€, from 1h until 11h of the day after is 50€ VAT included per apartment and they have to pay at check in - Reception contact from 11.00 to 19.00 (0034)630.757.791 and the emergency service from 19.00 till 11.00 (0034)677.738.635 - Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in.
